p: For genetic analysis of 69 HAdV-7 strains isolated during 2012â€“2015 in this study, the complete sequences of penton base, hexon, and fiber genes were amplified by PCR. The sequences of the three genes were similar among different strains (< 0.4% difference) or identical; 18 HAdV-7 strains were selected as representative viruses for further analysis ( Table 1). Phylogenetic trees were constructed based on the established datasets of the three genes. The results showed that the topological structures of NJ trees were consistent with those of ML trees. Thus, only the NJ tree was presented ( Fig 1).
